title: Tesla’s Germany Sales Down 72% From Their Peak!
description:
After writing about Tesla’s 10% drop in sales in the UK despite the UK EV market rising 24%, and BYD passing up Tesla in the UK in annual sales last year, a reader pointed out some extra jaw-dropping stats. The reader, “manes,” posted the numbers for Tesla in Germany in ... [continued]

The post Tesla’s Germany Sales Down 72% From Their Peak! appeared first on CleanTechnica.
